body: Racoon soup, opossum soup, raccoon soup, opossum soup, another bowl please woop woop galoop, roadkill soup, used panties soup, mushroom soup, hotdog water soup, another bowl please woop woop galoop, sometimes I, I think of soup, the soup i think of soup, but does my soup think of me? another bowl please woop woop galoop.

My ex girlfriend also turned into soup and it's ironic because she would always say "could you feed the cat" so obviously when she turned into soup I kinda felt like it served her right. There was a lot of soup my cat is still eating soup.
The man under me was later found in the soup, he was in the soup, the soup that he was in, he was soup. That's why you should never go on a fake diet plan. You'll turn into soup.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i am not sorry .
